page.title: 01NORTHERN PORTSMOUTH HARBOUR
page.content: This block covers most of Northern Portsmouth Harbour. Portchester Castle, a well preserved Roman Fort with Norman additions, is also here, and we conducted a tourism survey there. The conservation area of Castle Street is nearby, and we looked at tourism and events there. The Naval presence is strong, with Whale Island, home of HMS Excellent and Naval land near Gosport in this block, but this is only a shadow of fifty years ago when locals can remember the Harbour as a sea of grey through the battleships. Today the Royal Navy is much reduced in size. Lastly, we looked at services provided in the South West corner of this block.
